markdown:
[Skip to main content](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868053471004-Accessing-your-Stripe-dashboard-for-reporting-on-Checkfront-Payments-payouts#main-content) * * * For those using _Checkfront Payments_ as their payment provider, you can report on payouts using your [Stripe Dashboard](https://dashboard.stripe.com/login), as _Stripe_ powers _Checkfront Payments_. | | | | --- | --- | | ![354032 - aim bullseye goal sea target.png](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868069646364) | **What are payouts?**
Payouts represent your share of the funds from booking payment transactions deposited into your bank account. | | | | | --- | --- | | ![stripe@192.png](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868053457564) | Follow this quick link to access your _Stripe_ Dashboard:
- [https://dashboard.stripe.com/login](https://dashboard.stripe.com/login) | * * * ## How to access the Stripe Dashboard and Payouts [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868053471004-Accessing-your-Stripe-dashboard-for-reporting-on-Checkfront-Payments-payouts# "Back to top") You can follow these steps to access your _Stripe_ Dashboard and report on payouts. 1. Go to the [Stripe Dashboard](https://dashboard.stripe.com/login). 2. Log in with your _Stripe_ email address and password. [Trouble signing in?](https://support.stripe.com/questions/trouble-signing-in) 3. Go to **Balances** in the left navigation menu. 4. Select the **Payouts** tab. | | | | --- | --- | | ![stripe@192.png](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868053457564) | **Do you need help with Stripe?**
You can find many helpful online resources through [Stripe Support](https://support.stripe.com/), including information on:
- [Payouts](https://support.stripe.com/topics/payouts)
- [Dashboard](https://support.stripe.com/topics/dashboard)
Reach out to Stripe for live support here:
- [Contact Stripe Support](https://support.stripe.com/contact/login) | * * * ## Frequently Asked Questions [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868053471004-Accessing-your-Stripe-dashboard-for-reporting-on-Checkfront-Payments-payouts# "Back to top") **What do I need to use the feature mentioned in this article?** - You must have [_Checkfront Payments_](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868181139868) (or _[Stripe](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868666047772))_ as your Payment Provider. - You need your _Stripe_ email address and password to access your _Stripe_ dashboard. - You require [Admin](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868502205212) permissions to manage payments in _Checkfront_.
